description: Provides initial configuration for a freshly installed openvox-agent.

puppet_conf.description: Hash of puppet configuration settings to write to the puppet.conf ini file. NOTE: This will completely overwrite any existing settings in the file; there is no merging behavior in this task.

csr_attributes.description: Hash of CSR attributes (custom_attributes and extension_requests) to write to the csr_attributes.yaml file. NOTE: This will completely overwrite any existing settings in the file; there is no merging behavior in this task.

puppet_service_running.description: Whether the Puppet service should be running after this task completes. Defaults to true.

puppet_service_enabled.description: Whether the Puppet service should be enabled to start on boot after this task completes. Defaults to true.
